name: Daiichi - Fukushima Disaster
description:
Daiichi is a game that takes place in Fukushima Daiichi, Japan. You will live the experience of the nuclear disaster of Fukushima, right after Daiichi gets hit by an earth shake and tsunami. You are going to control Hinomaru Katsuo, a nuclear engineer in charge of ascertaining the issues caused by the disaster. But you need to run to avoid that a worse catastrophe happen. 

This game is a prototype, may contain bugs.

PC keybinds:

  • W/A/S/D - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Aim
